allowedLicenses.description: Licenses that are approved for use without review

reviewRequired.description: Licenses that require legal review but are not forbidden (e.g., LGPL)

forbidden.description: Licenses that are not allowed (e.g., GPL, AGPL)

ignoreDev.description: If true, skip dev dependencies from license check

ignorePackages.description: Package names to ignore from license check

overrides.description: Manual license overrides for packages with missing/incorrect license info
